verses.text: \w These|strong="H1931"\w* events \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Ahasuerus, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w ruled|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H4427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty-seven|strong="H6242"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w India|strong="H1912"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w ended|strong="H4390"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w held|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w*, \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* low alike. \w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*’ \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* enclosed \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*.

There \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w white|strong="H2353"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* cotton curtains fastened \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w rings|strong="H1550"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w marble|strong="H8336"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w purple|strong="H8504"\w* wool \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w couches|strong="H4296"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* placed \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mosaic|strong="H7531"\w* \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w alabaster|strong="H8336"\w*, \w white|strong="H2353"\w* \w marble|strong="H8336"\w*, \w mother-of-pearl|strong="H1858"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* dark stone.

\w Drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* – \w which|strong="H2091"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* all different – \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w provided|strong="H8248"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* liberality.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8360"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* unrestricted, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* directed \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officers|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleased|strong="H7522"\w*.

\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* women \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus’ \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w merry|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* commanded \w Mehuman|strong="H4104"\w*, Biztha, \w Harbona|strong="H2726"\w*, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zathar \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Carkas|strong="H3752"\w*, \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* attendants

\w to|strong="H6440"\w* bring \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* diadem \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w head|strong="H8269"\w*, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w very|strong="H2896"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w come|strong="H2534"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* commanded \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w became|strong="H1697"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* within \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w turned|strong="H6256"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* precedents, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w custom|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* confer \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w law|strong="H1881"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H3427"\w* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w* \w Carshena|strong="H3771"\w*, \w Shethar|strong="H8369"\w*, Admatha, \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, \w Meres|strong="H4825"\w*, \w Marsena|strong="H4826"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w access|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w* highest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.

“\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w*”, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H3982"\w*, “\w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w obey|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* – \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus conveyed \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*! \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H1881"\w* say \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*?”

\w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w* replied \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, “\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrong|strong="H5753"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* refusal \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w reported|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* women \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* result \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* despise \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus commanded \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w*!’

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ladies|strong="H8282"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* refusal \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* contempt \w and|strong="H4428"\w* strife!

If \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w seems|strong="H2896"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w edict|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w laws|strong="H1881"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Media|strong="H4074"\w*, \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w repealed|strong="H5674"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w Vashti|strong="H2060"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus. \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* queen \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w another|strong="H7468"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w worthy|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w decree|strong="H6599"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* – \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* – \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* classes \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w honor|strong="H3366"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w husbands|strong="H1167"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Memucan|strong="H4462"\w* advised.
